fts.h File Reference

Global FTS include file. More...

#include <fts/sys.h>
#include <fts/lang.h>
#include <fts/runtime.h>

Detailed Description

Global FTS include file.

Object programmer just need to include this file as: 

   #include <fts/fts.h>
